assassin.text: Against enemies below 18% Health your Champions gain {0}% Attack and decrease enemies' defense Ability Accuracy by {1}%.  If enemies start the fight below 18% your Champions also gain 30% offensive Ability Accuracy.

blockproficiency.text: Increase the Block Proficiency of your Champions by {0}.

coagulate.text: Your Champions take {0}% less damage from any Bleed effect they suffer.

collartech.text: Retrofit Tech Champions with a field that inhibits enemy Power Gain by {0}%.

cosmicawareness.text: Imbue Cosmic Champions with perception rivalling Heimdall, reducing enemy Armor Up effectiveness by {0}%

courage.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {0}% while they're below 50% Health.

cruelty.text: Increase the Critical Damage of all Champions by {0}.

deepwounds.text: Bleed your Champions inflict lasts {0} seconds longer. If they have more HP than their target, their Bleed instantly strikes down an additional {1}% max Health from enemies.

despair.text: Debuffs applied to enemies reduce their healing and Regeneration by {0}% each

detectcosmic.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Cosmic enemies up to {0} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detectmutant.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Mutant enemies up to {0} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detectmystic.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Mystic enemies up to {0} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detectscience.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Science enemies up to {0} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detectskill.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Skill enemies up to {0} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detecttech.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Tech enemies up to {0} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

dexterity.text: Evade all attacks while Dodging back. Dodging an attack in this way grants {0}% Critical Rate for your next attack.

doubleedge.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {0}%, but up to {1}% Health is lost by Bleeding over {2} seconds.

energyresistance.text: Increase any Health your Champions recover during a fight by {0}%

enhancedfury.text: Increase the effectiveness of Fury by {0}%.

extendedfury.text: Increase the duration of Fury by {0} second(s).

glasscanon.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {0}%, but reduce their maximum Health by {1}%.

greaterstrength.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {0}%.

greatervitality.text: Increase the Health of all Champions by {0}%.

inequity.text: Decrease opponents' Attack by {0}% for each detrimental effect they sufer, up to a maximum of 36% reduction.

intelligence.text: Increases all Summoner XP rewards by {0}%.

lessercruelty.text: Increase the Critical Damage of all Champions by {0}.

lesserprecision.text: Increase the Critical Rate of all Champions by {0}.

limber.text: Rigorous mental and physical training reduces the duration of enemy Stun effects by {0}%.

liquidcourage.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {0}%, but they suffer an eternal Poison that drains {0}% Health each second.

mutagenesis.text: Rapid mutagenesis closes Bleed wounds in your Mutant Champions {0} second(s) faster than non-Mutants.

mysticdispersion.text: Your Mystic Champions accrue {0}% Power each time an enemy beneficial effect expires.

pacify.text: When you Champions inflict Stun, they also reduce enemy ability triggers by {0}% for the duration of the Stun.

parry.text: A well-timed Block right when attacked reduces damage by an additional {0}%. If contact is made by basic attacks, inflict a Stun Debuff for {1} second(s). Stun duraation increases by up to {2} second(s) with Perfect Block Chance.

perfectblock.text: While Blocking, your Champions have a {0}% chance to perform a Perfect Block.

petrify.text: When your Champions inflict Stun, they also reduce enemy Health and Power gains by up to {0}% for the duration of the Stun.

physicalresistance.text: Increase Resistance against Physical damage by {0} for all Champions.

pierce.text: Critical Hits from your Champions ignore an additional {0}% of Armor.

pitance.text: Earn +{0} Gold with all Gold rewards.

precision.text: Increase the Critical Rate of all Champions by {0}.

pureskill.text: With extensive field training, Skill Champions ignore an additional {0}% enemy Armor with Critical Hits.

recoil.text: Increase Special Attack damage for all Champions by {0}%, but they sacrifice {1}% Health for each activation.

recovery.text: Increase any Health your Champions recover during a fight by {0}%

resonate.text: Contact & Physical Attacks have a {0} chance to Weaken the opponent, reducing their Attack by {1}% for {2} seconds.

salve.text: Your Champions recover {0} Health twice per second for 60 seconds. No effect on robots.

scouterlens.text: Reveal the hidden Hero Rating and Star Rating of enemies up to {0} steps away on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

serumscience.text: Give Science Champions a Serum of {0} Energy Resistance.

standyourground.text: While Blocking, your Champions have a {0}% chance to resist a Block Break.

strength.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {0}.

stupefy.text: When your champions inflict Stun, it lasts for {0} additional second(s).

suture.text: Reduce the duration of enemy Bleed effects by {0}%.

unfazed.text: When an enemy Evades, your Champions have a {0}% chance to stack an additional {1} Critical Damage for their next Critical hit and become Unstoppable for {2} seconds

vitality.text: Increase the Health of all Champions by {0}.

willpower.text: For each new type of detrimental effect your champions suffer, they regenerate {0}% Health per second and gain +{1} Armor until that effect expires. No effect on robots.

wisdom.text: Earn +{0} XP with all Summoner XP rewards.
